title: SVIMS Tirupati: Admission 2024, Courses, Fees, Cutoff, Ranking, Placements
meta_description: SVIMS Tirupati is a top medical institution in Andhra Pradesh established in the year 1993. The institute was later declared as a State University by the Government of Andhra Pradesh in 1995.
keywords: SVIMS Tirupati,Sri Venkateswara Institute of Medical Sciences,SVIMS,SVIMS Admission,SVIMS Fees,SVIMS Courses,SCIMS Placements

basic_info.name: SVIMS Tirupati Highlights
description: Here are the important highlights of SVIMS Tirupati:

basic_info.name: SVIMS Tirupati Rankings
description: SVIMS Tirupati has been recognized as one of the institutions for upgradation at par with AIIMS Delhi by the Government of India. The university is a leading center for providing medical care, educational, and research facilities of a higher order in the field of Medical Sciences. Given below are the rankings for SVIMS Tirupati over the last few years:

basic_info.name: SVIMS Tirupati Courses & Fees
description: SVIMS Tirupati offers various UG, PG, and Doctoral courses in the fields of Medical Sciences, Nursing, Physiotherapy, and Allied Health Sciences. MBBS, B.Sc Nursing, BPT, MD, M.Sc Nursing, MPT, DM/ M.Ch, and Ph.D. are some of the major courses offered by SVIMS Tirupati. The institute also offers various other Diploma and Certificate courses as well at both UG and PG levels.
Here are the complete details about SVIMS Tirupati Courses & Fees:

basic_info.name: SVIMS Tirupati Admission 2024
description: Sri Venkateswara Institute of Medical Sciences (SVIMS) offers MBBS at UG, MD/ MS at PG, and DM/ M.Ch at the Super Specialty levels in the field of Medicine. Apart from that, the college various other UG and PG courses in Nursing, Physiotherapy, and Allied Health Sciences (AHS). The entrance exams for admission to various courses at SVIMS Tirupati are as follows:

basic_info.name: How to Apply for SVIMS Admission 2024?
description: Candidates seeking admission to courses such as MBBS, MD/MS, and DM/M.Ch with national-level entrance exams such as NEET UG, NEET PG, and NEET SS need to apply for MCC NEET Counselling or Andhra Pradesh NEET Counselling (Conducted by YSRUHS) for admission to All-India Quota or State Quota Seats, respectively.
For admission to all other UG Courses, candidates need to apply as per the steps given below:
Check More in Detail: SVIMS Tirupati ​Admission 2024

basic_info.name: SVIMS Tirupati Cutoff 2024
description: SVIMS Tirupati Cutoff is the minimum mark or rank the candidates need to score in order to secure a seat at the desired course at SVIMS Tirupati. The candidates fulfilling the set SVIMS Tirupati Cutoff for the respective course will be granted admission to the college during the counseling process.

basic_info.name: SVIMS Tirupati MBBS Cutoff 2024
description: SVIMS Tirupati MBBS Cutoff 2024 will be released once NEET 2024 is conducted. Here is the SVIMS Tirupati NEET Cutoff in 2023 for admission to the MBBS course:

basic_info.name: SVIMS Tirupati Placements
description: SVIMS Tirupati provides training and placement opportunities to all its students in both UG and PG courses. SVIMS Tirupati Placements 2023 Report has not been released yet. However, SVIMS Tirupati NIRF Report 2023 has been released. According to the SVIMS NIRF Report 2023, the median package offered during SVIMS Tirupati MBBS and MD/MS Placements 2022 stood at INR 6.49 LPA and INR 35.41 LPA, respectively.
Here are the complete details about SVIMS Tirupati Placements for the year 2022:

basic_info.name: SVIMS Tirupati Results
description: SVIMS Tirupati releases the results for its semester/ annual exams for various UG, PG, Super Specialty, and Doctoral courses on its official website. The university releases the course-wise results in the form of a PDF on its official website.
Here are the steps to check SVIMS Tirupati Results:

description: SVIMS Tirupati offers all major facilities for its students as well as the faculty. Here are the details about the facilities offered by SVIMS Tirupati:

basic_info.name: SVIMS Tirupati Faculty
description: The institute is blessed with highly experienced and well qualified set of faculty. The professors give their best to provide maximum knowledge to the students and help them with the challenges faced during the course. The faculty members are extra-ordinary in their respective fields and their teaching is at a level more than average. Some of the faculty members are:

description: Ques. Is SVIMS Tirupati a private or government college?
Ques. Is SVIMS recognized by MCI?

faqs.question: Ques. Is SVIMS Tirupati a private or government college?
faqs.answer: Ans.SVIMS Tirupati is recognized as a State University by the Government of Andhra Pradesh under the Andhra Pradesh State Legislature Act. It is affiliated with Dr. YSR University of Health Sciences.

faqs.question: Is SVIMS recognized by MCI?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, all the programs offered by SVIMS Tirupati are recognized by the Medical Council of India (MCI)/ National Medical Commission (NMC). The university is also recognized by UGC.

faqs.question: What are the UG courses offered by SVIMS Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Ans.SVIMS Tirupati offers UG courses in the fields of Medicine, Nursing, Physiotherapy, and Allied Health Sciences. Here are the various UG courses offered by SVIMS:MBBSB.Sc NursingBPTB.Sc in Allied Health Sciences

faqs.question: What is the fees for MBBS at SVIMS?
faqs.answer: Ans.The annual tuition fee for MBBS at SVIMS Tirupati is INR 60,000. Apart from that, the students also need to pay INR 7,900 for other miscellaneous charges annually. Thus, the candidates need to pay INR 67,900 Per Annum for 5 Years for MBBS at SVIMS Tirupati.

faqs.question: Does SVIMS Tirupati offer hostel accommodation?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, all the students who require hostel accommodation will be provided hostels on a single/shared basis on a rent fixed as per the rules of the institute, subject to availability. The present room rent at SVIMS Tirupati is INR 2,600 for a single room and INR 1,300 for a shared one.

faqs.question: How many seats are offered for MBBS at SVIMS Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Ans.SVIMS Tirupati offers a total of 175 Seats for admission to MBBS. Out of these, 26 Seats are reserved for AIQ Seats, 126 Seats for State Quota, and 23 Seats for the NRI Category.

faqs.question: Which university is SVIMS affiliated with?
faqs.answer: Ans.SVIMS Tirupati is affiliated with Dr. YSR University of Health Sciences (YSRUHS).

faqs.question: What is the fees for B.Sc Nursing at SVIMS Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Ans.The course fee for B.Sc Nursing at SVIMS Tirupati is INR 42,400 Per Annum.

faqs.question: What is the placement package offered at SVIMS Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Ans.SVIMS Tirupati Placements 2023 Report is yet to be released. As per the SVIMS NIRF Report 2023,the median package offered during SVIMS Tirupati MBBS and MD/MS Placements 2022 stood at INR 6.49 LPA and INR 35.41 LPA, respectively.

faqs.question: Ques. Which documents are required at the time of counseling for MBBS at SVIMS Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Ans.Given below are the documents required at the time of counseling for admission to MBBS at SVIMS Tirupati:Provisional Allotment Order issued by MCC, DGHS for AIQ Category.Provisional Admission Order issued by YSRUHS for State Category.NEET UG Admit CardNEET UG Rank CardClass X /SSC Marks CertificateIntermediate (+2) CertificateTransfer / Migration CertificateStudy Certificates from Class VI to XIIValid EWS Certificate as per MCC Format (if applicable)Valid Caste Certificate as per MCC Format (for SC/ST/OBC Categories)Valid Special Category Certificate (if applicable)Copy of Aadhar Card

Section.name: About SVIMS
Section.description:
Sri Venkateswara Institute of Medical Sciences (SVIMS), Tirupati, is a top medical institution in Andhra Pradesh established in the year 1993 on the lines of AIIMS Delhi. The institute was later declared as a State University by the Government of Andhra Pradesh in 1995. SVIMS Tirupati is recognized by UGC and all the programs of the institute are approved by the National Medical Commission (NMC). The institute is affiliated with Dr. YSR University of Health Sciences.
SVIMS Tirupati Campus is spread over an area of 107.04 Acres and is developing into a center of excellence for providing medical care, education, and research activities of a high standard. The institute offers hostel accommodation for both boys and girls with all the necessary facilities.
Here are the important highlights of SVIMS Tirupati:
SVIMS Tirupati has been recognized as one of the institutions for upgradation at par with AIIMS Delhi by the Government of India. The university is a leading center for providing medical care, educational, and research facilities of a higher order in the field of Medical Sciences. Given below are the rankings for SVIMS Tirupati over the last few years:
SVIMS Tirupati offers various UG, PG, and Doctoral courses in the fields of Medical Sciences, Nursing, Physiotherapy, and Allied Health Sciences. MBBS, B.Sc Nursing, BPT, MD, M.Sc Nursing, MPT, DM/ M.Ch, and Ph.D. are some of the major courses offered by SVIMS Tirupati. The institute also offers various other Diploma and Certificate courses as well at both UG and PG levels.
Here are the complete details about SVIMS Tirupati Courses & Fees:
Duration: 4 Years Course Fee: INR 30,400 Specializations: Anaesthesia Technology, ECG and Cardiovascular Technology, Medical Lab Technology, Neurophysiology Technology (EEG & ENMG), Radiography & Imaging Technology, Nuclear Medicine Technology, Dialysis Technology, Cardiac Pulmonary Perfusion Technology, Emergency Medical Services Technology, Radiotherapy Technology
Sri Venkateswara Institute of Medical Sciences (SVIMS) offers MBBS at UG, MD/ MS at PG, and DM/ M.Ch at the Super Specialty levels in the field of Medicine. Apart from that, the college various other UG and PG courses in Nursing, Physiotherapy, and Allied Health Sciences (AHS). The entrance exams for admission to various courses at SVIMS Tirupati are as follows:
Candidates seeking admission to courses such as MBBS, MD/MS, and DM/M.Ch with national-level entrance exams such as NEET UG, NEET PG, and NEET SS need to apply for MCC NEET Counselling or Andhra Pradesh NEET Counselling (Conducted by YSRUHS) for admission to All-India Quota or State Quota Seats, respectively.
For admission to all other UG Courses, candidates need to apply as per the steps given below:
Check More in Detail: SVIMS Tirupati ​Admission 2024
SVIMS Tirupati Cutoff is the minimum mark or rank the candidates need to score in order to secure a seat at the desired course at SVIMS Tirupati. The candidates fulfilling the set SVIMS Tirupati Cutoff for the respective course will be granted admission to the college during the counseling process.
SVIMS Tirupati MBBS Cutoff 2024 will be released once NEET 2024 is conducted. Here is the SVIMS Tirupati NEET Cutoff in 2023 for admission to the MBBS course:
SVIMS Tirupati provides training and placement opportunities to all its students in both UG and PG courses. SVIMS Tirupati Placements 2023 Report has not been released yet. However, SVIMS Tirupati NIRF Report 2023 has been released. According to the SVIMS NIRF Report 2023, the median package offered during SVIMS Tirupati MBBS and MD/MS Placements 2022 stood at INR 6.49 LPA and INR 35.41 LPA, respectively.
Here are the complete details about SVIMS Tirupati Placements for the year 2022:
SVIMS Tirupati releases the results for its semester/ annual exams for various UG, PG, Super Specialty, and Doctoral courses on its official website. The university releases the course-wise results in the form of a PDF on its official website.
Here are the steps to check SVIMS Tirupati Results:
SVIMS Tirupati offers all major facilities for its students as well as the faculty. Here are the details about the facilities offered by SVIMS Tirupati:
The institute is blessed with highly experienced and well qualified set of faculty. The professors give their best to provide maximum knowledge to the students and help them with the challenges faced during the course. The faculty members are extra-ordinary in their respective fields and their teaching is at a level more than average. Some of the faculty members are:
Dr. V.Subhadra Devi
Dr. J.Vasudeva Reddy
Dr. Abha Chandra
Dr. Alladi Mohan
Also check SVIMS Tirupati Faculty
Ques. Is SVIMS Tirupati a private or government college?
Ans. SVIMS Tirupati is recognized as a State University by the Government of Andhra Pradesh under the Andhra Pradesh State Legislature Act. It is affiliated with Dr. YSR University of Health Sciences.
Ques. Is SVIMS recognized by MCI?
Ans. Yes, all the programs offered by SVIMS Tirupati are recognized by the Medical Council of India (MCI)/ National Medical Commission (NMC). The university is also recognized by UGC.
Ques. What are the UG courses offered by SVIMS Tirupati?
Ans. SVIMS Tirupati offers UG courses in the fields of Medicine, Nursing, Physiotherapy, and Allied Health Sciences. Here are the various UG courses offered by SVIMS:
Ques. What is the fees for MBBS at SVIMS?
Ans. The annual tuition fee for MBBS at SVIMS Tirupati is INR 60,000. Apart from that, the students also need to pay INR 7,900 for other miscellaneous charges annually. Thus, the candidates need to pay INR 67,900 Per Annum for 5 Years for MBBS at SVIMS Tirupati.
Ques. Does SVIMS Tirupati offer hostel accommodation?
Ans. Yes, all the students who require hostel accommodation will be provided hostels on a single/shared basis on a rent fixed as per the rules of the institute, subject to availability. The present room rent at SVIMS Tirupati is INR 2,600 for a single room and INR 1,300 for a shared one.
Ques. How many seats are offered for MBBS at SVIMS Tirupati?
Ans. SVIMS Tirupati offers a total of 175 Seats for admission to MBBS. Out of these, 26 Seats are reserved for AIQ Seats, 126 Seats for State Quota, and 23 Seats for the NRI Category.
Ques. Which university is SVIMS affiliated with?
Ans. SVIMS Tirupati is affiliated with Dr. YSR University of Health Sciences (YSRUHS).
Ques. What is the fees for B.Sc Nursing at SVIMS Tirupati?
Ans. The course fee for B.Sc Nursing at SVIMS Tirupati is INR 42,400 Per Annum.
Ques. What is the placement package offered at SVIMS Tirupati?
Ans. SVIMS Tirupati Placements 2023 Report is yet to be released. As per the SVIMS NIRF Report 2023, the median package offered during SVIMS Tirupati MBBS and MD/MS Placements 2022 stood at INR 6.49 LPA and INR 35.41 LPA, respectively.
Ques. Which documents are required at the time of counseling for MBBS at SVIMS Tirupati?
Ans. Given below are the documents required at the time of counseling for admission to MBBS at SVIMS Tirupati:
